Treasury Stock: treasury stock value acquired cost method

Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax period increase decrease
Other OCI: other comprehensive income defined benefit plans adjustment net of tax period increase decrease
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
other comprehensive income losses net of tax period increase decrease
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: other comprehensive income unrealized holding gain loss on securities arising during period net of tax

Other Equity Adjustments: adjustment to retained earnings accretion of redeemable noncontrolling interests
cumulative effect of change in accounting principle related to current expected credit losses net of tax
cumulative effect of change in accounting principle related to leases net of tax
cumulative effect of the change in accounting principle related to forfeiture of share based awards
cumulative effect of the change in accounting principle related to forfeiture of share based awards net of tax
cumulative effect of the change in accounting principle related to revenue recognition from contracts with clients net of tax
reclassification of cumulative debt valuation adjustment net of tax from retained earnings to accumulated other comprehensive loss

Exercise of Stock Options: stock issued during period value stock options exercised
Other Stock Issuance: adjustments to additional paid in capital stock issued issuance costs
stock issued during period value acquisitions
stock issued during period value new issues
stock issued during period value restricted stock award forfeitures
stock issued during period value treasury stock reissued
Stock-Based Compensation: cancellation of share based awards in satisfaction of withholding tax requirements
cash settlement of share based awards
cash settlement of share based compensation
delivery of common stock underlying restricted stock units
forfeiture of restricted stock units and employee stock options
issuance and amortization of restricted stock units and employee stock options
issuance and amortization of share based awards
stock issued during period value share based compensation

Stock Repurchases: stock redeemed or called during period value
Tax Effects from Stock Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital tax effect from share based compensation
__unmapped__: dividends and dividend equivalents declared on common stock and restricted stock units
stock subject to possible redemption value
